Does OffSync share my data? We only share the minimal info required for a friend to accept a session (app list and duration). We never sell data.
Do I need to add an extension or special permissions? OffSync uses Apple’s Family Controls API. On iOS, you will need to grant permission for OffSync to suggest app limits.
